This document reflects the contents of Crediblemeds database:

+ **Drugs** ->  62
+ **DDIs** ->   84
+ **Description** of each DDI
+ **Mechanism of action** relates to targets, carriers and transporters, with its effect.
+ **Chemical group** the class the drug belongs to.
+ **TDP_risk_category** of each drug.
+ **Therapeutic use** of each drug.
+ **ATC** of each drug.
